General.Name: MFO SA
General.Description: MFO S.A. engages in the manufacture and sale of steel profiles in Poland. The company offers steel reinforcement for uPVC windows; steel profiles for roller shutters; CD, CW, UW, and UA profiles for drywall constructions, top hat steel sections, and additional mounting accessories; steel sections used in installations; mounting rails for ventilation and air conditioning; and steel posts for fencing systems and gates. Its products are used in electrical installations, technical flooring systems, semi-trailers and truck bodies, furniture, rack systems, fencing systems and gates, scaffolds, and photovoltaic systems. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Sochaczew, Poland.

2.Name: Mr. Adam  Piekutowski
